description: Numbers n such that n divides the (right) concatenation of all numbers <= n written in base 10 (most significant digit on right).
comments: This sequence differs from A061939 in that all least significant zeros are kept during concatenation.Right concatenation, reverse order.No more terms < 10^7. [Lars Blomberg, Oct 06 2011]
example: n = 22 is not a term since 12345678901112131415161718191021222 is not divisible by 22.See A029495 for other examples.
